SHOW_INFO.description: Binding to switch to personal info view

SHOW_SPACE_STATION.description: Binding to switch to space station view

SHOW_WORLD_VIEW.description: Binding to switch to or change worldview mode

SPEED_MODIFIER.description: General modifier used to scroll/rotate/zoom faster

SPEED_1X.description: General modifier to recall an accelerated time of 1x

SPEED_10X.description: General modifier to recall an accelerated time of 10x

SPEED_100X.description: General modifier to recall an accelerated time of 100x

SPEED_1000X.description: General modifier to recall an accelerated time of 1000x

SPEED_10000X.description: General modifier to recall an accelerated time of 10000x

SWITCH_TO_GALAXY_VIEW.description: Toggle between galaxy and world view

SWITCH_TO_SECTOR_VIEW.description: Toggle between sector and world view

SWITCH_TO_SYSTEM_INFO_VIEW.description: Toggle between system info and world view

SWITCH_TO_SYSTEM_VIEW.description: Toggle between system and world view

TEXT_AXIS_DEADZONE.description: Message shown for the axis deadzone slider.

TEXT_AXIS_SENSITIVITY.description: Message shown for the axis sensitivity slider.

TEXT_INVERT_AXIS.description: Message shown for the invert axis checkbox.

TEXT_KEY_BINDINGS.description: Section header for an axis or action's key bindings.

TEXT_KEY_NEGATIVE.description: Indicates the negative half of a key-binding pair.

TEXT_KEY_POSITIVE.description: Indicates the positive half of a key-binding pair.
